text:
Hey guys.

This might be a tricky one. I am needing to set up an integration with Stripe to send the payment event to HubSpot and then automatically move that deal to closed won. I can't find anything on Dev forms on either parties site for this. Any help will be greatly appreciated.

Hi <@U01MSMDHLRH>,

You can update the deal stage using PATCH*`/crm/v3/objects/deals/{dealId}`*

More information here <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/deals>

for sending payment related information you can store that in custom properties or better create timeline events - <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/timeline?_ga=2.85537177.1653982942.1613038492-937215786.1606117563>
Is there any plans to make a microsoft power platform connector?
Yeah, that would be two requests that's what I want to avoid to speed up the upload process that I have connected with the API

Hi,
I'm new to creating custom forms and submitting data through forms API. Is it possible to get lead tracking to work the same way as built in hs forms in a custom form?
Hi, I think that HubSpot don’t develop connector, community and some company does by their own

Hi,

Please create an issue on the community board and ping me on it (with <@U01DF3PNCKA> in his cotent)
i will answer on the board it’s easier
